name: Audio Clash: Battle of the Bands
storyline: In AudioClash: Battle of the Bands, create your dream band and outperform the competition to earn experience and unlock rewards. AudioClash features 8-player support where your strategic choice of abilities and stage placement affect your defensive and offensive outcomes. With a large roster of band managers and band members from across time, space and alternate realities; as well as plenty of songs, and accessories to choose from, you’ll create your own style and unique music in this one-of-kind auto-battler!
summary: Create a band and dominate the competition in this new music-themed auto-battler developed by Big Boat Interactive in conjunction with The Living Tombstone. Take part in 8-player battles and unleash your abilities to win and earn rewards. AudioClash features all members of The Living Tombstone!
